data.title: A little walk up window for some Great Gyros
data.text:
This little hole in the wall place has some great Gyros. It has a great amount of filling in that soft pita bread.  It is not as heavy on Oregano as some other places, but it is good anyway.  

As a customer you park and walk up to the back of the building where the order window is.  When we were there was a line of people getting ice cream and hotdogs.  We got our order and went over to the table and sat down to eat our delicious food.

I don't know if they operate in the Winter.  I hope to go back again.

data.title: Fantastic Gyros!
data.text: I just randomly happened upon this place and am very happy I did! The gyro was excellent, and I was too full after eating it to get any Italian ice, but I'm sure that is great, too. The owner is very nice and friendly. This is definitely a place I recommend, and I will go back.
